title: How To Use rstockwatch Package
text: package built following four functions: percent_change Calculation profit percentage change stock given period time based data extracted Yahoo finance. profit_viz Visualization profit percentage change trend stock market benchmark given period time. Note weekends public holidays, stock market data available, handled plotting well volume_change Calculation daily trading volume change stock, whether increasing decreasing. data used next function color mapping bar plot. volume_viz Visualization trading volume bar plots colored changes volume comparison previous day. plot overlayed line plots created second function. . Note weekends public holidays, stock market data available, handled plotting well

what: Comparison with similar packages in R Ecosystem
title: How To Use rstockwatch Package
text: many packages written analysis stock data. One relevant R package category stockAnalyzer, allows lot manipulations time series data, creating moving averages calculating parameters technical analysis. Power Rstockwatch simplicity, users overwhelmed extra features just simple view key comparisons stock interest.

title: How To Use rstockwatch Package
text: can install development version GitHub (remove comment sign # installng):

title: How To Use rstockwatch Package
text: successful installation package user recommend restart R session update dependencies packages. functions package require input four parameters: stock_ticker, start_date, end_date benchmark_ticker. Output results form plot based “ggplot” package. Import functions package following commands: 1. check profit percent 2. visualize profit percentage change trend stock stock market benchmark  3. check daily trading volume change stock 4. visualize volume change trend stock

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributing to Rstockwatch
text: outlines propose change Rstockwatch. detailed info contributing , tidyverse packages, please see development contributing guide.

title: Contributing to Rstockwatch
text: can fix typos, spelling mistakes, grammatical errors documentation directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. generally means ’ll need edit roxygen2 comments .R, .Rd file. can find .R file generates .Rd reading comment first line.

title: Contributing to Rstockwatch
text: want make bigger change, ’s good idea first file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s needed. ’ve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex (also help write unit test, needed).

title: Contributing to Rstockwatch
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven’t done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("UBC-MDS/Rstockwatch", fork = TRUE). Install development dependencies devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e. just first header). Follow style described https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html.

title: Contributing to Rstockwatch
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat unit tests. Contributions test cases included easier accept.

title: Contributing to Rstockwatch
text: Please note Rstockwatch project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project agree abide terms.

what: Make simple visualization of stock data
title: Make simple visualization of stock data
text: goal Rstockwatch package provide simple interface checking movements stock prices comparison market. implemented accessing public data Yahoo Finance selecting ticker stock, range start end dates benchmark comparison, SP500 NASDAQ. result data processing Rstockwatch package, user able see plot two lines showing percentage change since start date volumes trading.

title: Make simple visualization of stock data
text: package built following four functions: - percent_change Calculation profit percentage change stock given period time based data extracted Yahoo finance. - profit_viz Visualization profit percentage change trend stock market benchmark given period time. Note weekends public holidays, stock market data available, handled plotting well - volume_change Calculation daily trading volume change stock, whether increasing decreasing. data used next function color mapping bar plot. - volume_viz Visualization trading volume bar plots colored changes volume comparison previous day. plot overlayed line plots created second function. . Note weekends public holidays, stock market data available, handled plotting well
